name: Karagiannis Dimitris
profile_content: Electrical and computer engineer(BSc & MEng). Passionate about computer science, with strong technical, business,and interpersonal skills for working in a team and successfully completing a project.

items: Spent more than a year working on my diploma theses. I created a fullstack aplications that used Mapbox to serve and display energy data that contained associated location information.

The process of choosing my development stack was simple. I went through most web frameworks available at the time, including React, Vue, Svelte or even plain vanilla JS. I gained experienced writing on all of them and eventually settled on Svelt.
This was also my first experience with postgresql as a database and that made me love it. It is currently my database of choise
Worked with C# on MVC projects as a backend / database engineer. The project contained a full JSON API and a SQL Server to back it up.
Worked on a B2B project that served millions of user throught Europe, implementing features like social logins, i18n, new data flows and many more.
Created an Outlook Extensions that communicated with a server as a fronted for a messaging service
More random projects like a cui serializer for database data exporting, a GUI that uploaded user provided tickets from a file to Azure.
Studied under really talented teachers and got my first expreriences with math physics and software.
Learned more than a dozen of programming langugeas and gained experience working with low level code in C/C++ or even assembly on IOT platoforms
Later in these years I was exposed to databases and server code, implementing fullstack system for the more 'advanced' classes that I took
